title: Looking for a ranked team to join :)
body: looking for a season 6 ranked 5s team ! Currently silver 4 and will join any team that offers! I play heaps most weeknights and weekends, I main jungle and mid can play support also if necessary, I am really dedicated to improving and trying my hardest but other then that  pretty chill any ranked team is cool! add me if any offers :)

replies.body: I am bronze 3 and my team mates always let me down and flame me for being better than them. I main teemo jg. Add me: xo janna xo

Was Silver 3 last season im a support main and looking for a team to help improve my decision making and mechanics. would love to join if available
IGN:bigmahn

I'm currently Silver 3 and am also looking for a 5's team to join. I can play most roles but my best is probably mid. Similarly, I'm looking to improve my mechanics as much as possible for this season so I feel like a ranked team would be a good semi-serious way to do so. Feel free to add me if you need another player that can fill :)
add me! we can start a team!
